description:

ALL NATURAL: There is no substitute for the flavor of real fruit. High quality fruit is at the heart of Funkin Cocktails because the secret to a great drink is great ingredients.
VERSATILE INGREDIENT: Use in more than just cocktails. Try it in smoothies, baking, pastries, as an ice cream topping and more.
CONVENIENT AND HASSLE-FREE: No waste and preparation required to make an unlimited variety of real-fruit cocktails. Easy open, pour and resealable packaging for perfect convenience.

Perfect for juices, smoothies, cocktails, desserts, sauces, marinades, and ice creams. Great yield! A 1/2 gallon bottle makes 2 gallons of delicious juice.
Vegan. Non-GMO. Gluten-free. Kosher. Sweetened with all-natural cane sugar. No high-fructose corn, processed sugars, or artificial sweeteners.
Minimal packaging and standard shipping, to save you money and help care for our planet.
Purees ship insulated, but may arrive safely at warmer temperatures. Simply refrigerate upon arrival.

name: Galvanina - Clementine With Pulp - Premium Organic Italian Sparkling Fruit Beverage
description:
This is a unique soft drink with the intense and unmistakeable flavor of top-quality organic clementines grown in Sicily.
It boasts all the unique flavors of these delicious fruits, with their delicate but long lasting aroma, which are packed with vitamins and antioxidants
Galvanina makes an exquisite addition to picnics and dinner parties, and an indulgent treat just for you
During pressing, the pulp of the fruit is hand-sieved and used in the soft drink which is prepared using mineral water, organic cane sugar, and carbonation from natural origin and is USDA certified organic. Clementine, a veritable delight for the palate!
USDA Certified Organic - Ideal mixer for cocktails - Sweetened with organic cane sugar

name: Jungle Pulp Passion Fruit Puree Mix , from Costa Rica for Iced Drinks
description:
POWERFUL AND UNIQUE TROPICAL INGREDIENT IN BAKERY, SMOOTHIES, COCKTAILS AND KITCHEN. The taste of Costa Rica-grown passion fruit will contribute to your baking ideas, cocktails and kitchen creations in that unique way you’ve always wanted.
IT WILL MAKE YOUR COOKING FUN AND EASY BUT ALSO INSPIRE YOUR CREATIVITY. From an irresistible passion fruit curd to a bubbly passion fruit mimosa, the sky is the limit. A recipe has been added to the label to ignite your inspiration
SWEETENED WITH LOCAL SUGAR CANE, it requires no refrigeration until opening and it is packed in a 1-liter bottle. No mess, no hassle. Clean cooking and stores easily. The passion fruit flavor from tropics preserved through pasteurization, you only need to open and pour.
PASSION FRUIT JUICE TASTES LIKE SUNSET ON THE BEACH. In addition, you can make a full gallon of fresh sweetened jugo de maracuya with the unique taste you can only get in the real tropics.
COMMUNITY SUPPORT, Costa Rica honors strict environmental local laws for harvesting and at the same this product supports farmers and local communities. If for any reason you are not 100% happy with this product, we'll fully refund it to you, no questions asked.

The lemons are rich in vitamins and have excellent antioxidant properties, enhanced by ripening under the sun and thanks to cold pressing during which time the pulp of the fruit is sieved by hand

ITS GOOD FOR YOU: Not only does our Aloe taste good, it’s good for you. The antioxidants and vitamins in Iberia Aloe help lower blood glucose levels, improve heart health, and improve the appearance of skin.

name: Post Great Grains Cereal: Crunchy Pecan
description:
Crisp flakes and crunchy clusters mix up the texture, with scoops of whole pecans thrown in for an extra heart-healthy boost. We love that this hearty option packs 5 grams of fiber and protein, with only 5 grams of added sugar.
Per 3/4 cup serving: 210 cal, 5g fat, 160mg sodium, 39g carb, 5g fiber, 5g added sugar, 5g protein

name: Kashi Go Original
description:
Meet 46% of your daily fiber and 17% of your daily protein needs with a serving of this crunch cereal from KASHI. It's lightly sweetened and pairs well with a few raspberries or blackberries tossed into your cereal bowl.
Per 1 1/4 cup serving: 180 cal 2g fat, 115mg sodium, 40g carb, 13g fiber, 7g added sugar, 12g protein

name: Alpen Muesli No Sugar Added
description:
This Swiss-style muesli is (taking breakfast to new heights) with its simple ingredient list: whole grain oats, whole grain wheat, raisins, almonds, and hazelnuts (that's it).
Per 2/3 cup serving: 210 cal, 3.5g fat, 20mg sodium, 43g carb, 7g fiber, 0g added sugar, 8g protein

name: KIND Almond Butter Whole Grain Clusters
description:
Not only does this KIND granola pack a great amount of flavor, but it also contains a whopping 10 grams of protein and is gluten-free. Pour a little milk over these cinnamon- and nut-flavored clusters for a super-satisfying snack.
Per serving: 240 cal, 6g fat, 135mg sodium, 38g carb, 4g fiber, 7g added sugar, 10g protein

name: Uncle Sam Toasted Whole Wheat Berry Flakes
description:
What is a whole-wheat berry flake, you ask?! Trust us: it's good. We love that it has 10 grams of fiber to start your day right and also has heart-healthy omega-3 fatty acids from flaxseeds.
Per 3/4 cup serving: 220 cal, 6g fat, 140mg sodium, 43g carb, 10g fiber, 0g added sugar, 8g protein

name: Love Grown Power O's
description:
These crunchy puffs are made from navy, lentil and garbanzo beans, so they're packed with plant-based protein. There's no added sugar, but they don't taste bean-y. They're also gluten and corn free, and come in cinnamon and chocolate too.
Per 1 1/4 cup serving: 130 cal, 1g fat, 115mg sodium, 28g carb, 5g fiber, 0g added sugar, 6g protein

name: Back to Nature Grain-Free Cocoa Granola Crunch
description:
Good Housekeeping nutritionist-approved, Back to Nature offers a new line of grain-free granolas that are plant-based, gluten-free and free from hydrogenated oils and high fructose corn syrup. We love the simple ingredients and that it has only 4 grams of sugar.
Per 1/3 cup serving: 170 cal, 12g fat, 80mg sodium, 7g carb, 4g fiber, 4g added sugar, 3g protein

name: Fiber One Original Bran
description:
As the name suggests, there's a whopping 18g of fiber (more than half your daily serving) in 2/3 cup and only 90 calories in one serving of this bran cereal. We like using half a cup of Fiber One and pairing it with half a cup of another cereal for extra flavor and fiber.
Per 2/3 cup serving: 90 cal, 1g fat, 140mg sodium, 34g carb, 18g fiber, 0g sugar, 3g protein

name: Mom's Best Toasted Wheatfuls
description:
This Non-GMO shredded wheat cereal is made with only two ingredients and has zero grams of sugar (but packs an impressive 55 grams of whole grains per serving). It’s the perfect fiber-packed breakfast to power you through the day! Definitely add in some berries or a chopped banana for more flavor, or do half a cup of this cereal with another one on the list for more variety.
Per 22 biscuits: 200 cal, 1.5g fat, 10mg sodium, 48g carb, 8g fiber, 0g added sugar, 7g protein

name: Forager Organic Grain-free Os
description:
These crunchy O's are made with cassava flour and navy beans, which helps to pack them with plant-based protein and fiber. Flavors include plain, cinnamon, and chocolate which will certainly bring you back to your childhoods days. We like throwing in a sliced banana or berries for extra flavor.
Per 1 cup: 110 calories, 1g fat, 5mg sodium, 26g carb, 4g fiber, 3g added sugar, 4g protein

name: 1 Lb Non-GMO Organic Whole Wheat Kernels
description:
🌾 WHOLE GRAINS - WHOLE WHEAT BERRIES - WHOLE KERNEL WHEAT - Handy Pantry winter wheat seed is a versatile grain berry and can be milled, cooked, baked, sprouted, or grown and juiced as heart-healthy wheatgrass. Bulk wheat maintains a long shelf life and is perfect for long term storage and prep.
🌾 WHEAT BERRY GRAIN FOR SPROUTING - HARD WHITE WHEAT BERRIES FOR WHEATGRASS- Easy and convenient whole wheat grain for indoor sprouting and juicing in just days! Sprouted wheat kernels are popular in sprout mixes and as a garnish, but try sprouted heirloom wheat seeds as a high-protein snack.
🌾 HEIRLOOM WHEAT FLOUR - GROUND WHEAT BERRIES - NON GMO WHEAT BAKING - Hard white wheat grain is often milled into a traditional heirloom wheat flour. Try non GMO wheat grain in a simple wheat berry bread, hard white wheat pasta, or whole kernel wheat bran. Hard white wheat berries store well!
🌾 WHEAT BERRIES ORGANIC - NON GMO WHEAT- Certified Organic by Oregon Tilth, Handy Pantry wheat berry seeds for sprouting and bulk grain boasts a high-germination rate, long shelf life, and resealable for quality and ease. Wheat berries bulk are ideal for commercial sprouting, baking, and sowing.
🌾 PRODUCT OF USA - Our Handy Pantry customer service and workforce is proudly based in the US along with our bulk wheat, winter wheat seed, rye berry bulk grain, barley bulk grains, and whole oat grain berry being sustainably sourced.

description:

This ancient form of wheat also offers an enviable nutritional profile, rich in fiber, protein, and a variety of essential minerals (including manganese, phosphorus, iron, & zinc).
Try it just once, and wholesome and delicious PURELIVING Organic Sprouted Spelt Flour will quickly become your go-to flour of choice for all your baking needs!
A natural process for preserving the many wonders of new life, sprouting increases the bioavailability of key nutrients in the whole grain and simplifies their absorption by the body for energy and nourishment!
For tender baked goods with a light crumb, substitute PURELIVING Sprouted Spelt Flour cup-for-cup for other whole grain flours. Spelt flour produces a lower rise than wheat, so use a leavening agent for added lift, if desired.
Certified organic; Certified Kosher

name: Star Anise Whole, Certified Organic - 18g
description:
✔ Origin: Star anise, the star shaped fruit of an oriental tree, this tree originated in China and Vietnam.
✔ Flavor: Bitter and reminiscent of anise.
✔ Aroma: The pods smell of licorice and are stronger than normal anise.
✔ Culinary uses: Star anise can be used whole, in sections, or ground. A little goes a long way with this spice as the flavor is strong. The spice is used in sweets, with the addition of sweeteners to combat the bitterness, but is more commonly found in meat and poultry dishes. It is an ingredient in the warming Indian spice blend, garam masala, and Masala chai. Star anise fits wonderfully in tomato sauces and braised beef dishes. The spice is very common in soups, sauces, meat and chicken dishes, and eggs.

name: Balti Curry DIY - Whole Spices, Certified Organic - 1.8 oz
description: ✔ Spices get their intense flavor and aroma from volatile oils locked inside the whole spice. Grinding spices releases these oils, which means that many pre-ground spices—while convenient—have lost a lot of their magic before they reach your kitchen. The fresher the grind, the more potent the spice. This blend contains whole spice that you grind fresh yourself. Each spice is carefully selected and curated from farms that practice environmental stewardship and empower their local communities.

name: Organic Coriander Powder,
description:

This spice from which the powder is made is also known to be one of the world's oldest spices. To preserve the flavour of the powder for long, it must be stored in airtight containers.
✔ All our products are certified Organic, Kosher, Non- GMO project and gluten free. We can trace our food from your plate right back to the farmer’s fields. By choosing organic food, you will enjoy food full of nutrients and flavor, grown without pesticides, herbicides or GMO technology.

name: Organic Cinnamon True Ceylon Powder - 1LBS
description:

The powder is light brown in color, filled like a cigar and boasts delicately sweet flavors and aromas. The unique flavor of Cinnamon (True Ceylon) Powder comes from the inner bark of an evergreen Sri Lankan tree. It is much sweeter than its counterpart, Cassia, and represents the ideal choice for incorporating into smoothies, savory meals, desserts and much more.
✔ This spice powder has distinct health benefits such as controlled blood sugar. It also functions as a natural anti-inflammatory and can improve blood lipid profiles.
